title: How to get level 6 on the boards to comment?

replies.body: Sometimes an account needs to sync with the boards, especially if it's posting for the first time.  This can usually be done through posting in a region without a level requirement.  It looks like your profile has successfully updated.  Welcome and happy posting!
By posting, your Boards profile synchronises with your game profile. You're all synced now! Welcome to the League Community and have a splash posting!!
